DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of Xingnaojing for the treatment of convulsive diseases; to investigate whether convulsion episodes can be induced or aggravated by Xingnaojing and the role inflammation plays in the process.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study of Xingnaojing for the Treatment of Convulsive Diseases
